ot.java:175)

sformerFactoryImpl.java:807)

ggregateTransformer.java:316)

nsform(AggregateTransformer.java:190)

ute(XMLResultAggregator.java:170)

so i assume i am missing an auxiliary jar of some kind...
any suggestions?
